AIShowcase.description: We orchestrate the world's most powerful AI models with our proprietary Code Antigravity framework, managing complex context via MCP for true enterprise autonomy.

antigravity.title: Code Antigravity
antigravity.description: Our proprietary engine for agentic behaviors. It overcomes friction, enabling AI to think, plan, and execute complex coding and operational tasks autonomously.

n8n.title: n8n Automation
n8n.description: Visual workflow orchestration that connects your AI agents to thousands of apps, ensuring seamless execution of business processes.

llm.title: LLM & Multi-Model Matrix
llm.description: We don't rely on a single brain. We integrate OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and DeepSeek, routing tasks to the most capable model for the specific job.

context.title: MCP & Context
context.description: Enterprise-grade memory management using the Model Context Protocol. We ensure your AI retains critical business context securely across all interactions.

auralis.title: Auralis
auralis.description: The advanced AI partner for legal firms. Auralis doesn't just manage schedules; it intelligently distributes caseloads, optimizes attorney bandwidth, and proactively communicates with clients.

clou.title: Clou
clou.description: Your AI-powered nutritional strategist. Clou analyzes dietary patterns, health goals, and metabolic data to craft dynamic, evolving nutrition plans that adapt to your progress.
